code:
import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newPerson){return axios.post(baseUrl,newPerson).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deleteObject=function deleteObject(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line
export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deleteObject:deleteObject};
